name: Lily & Sury: Adventures On Cristya
summary:
Classic retro-style platform game. Help Lily or Sury save your friends from the evil Wuning through 8 worlds and 32 levels.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, save your companions from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from destroying the planet Cristya.
